alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Lorain; Medina; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 8:34PM EDT until August 08 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Ashland County in north central Ohio... Southwestern Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Northern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Southeastern Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 833 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lodi, or 12 miles west of Medina, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Cuyahoga Falls, Brunswick, Barberton, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Lodi, Creston, West Salem, Chippewa Lake, Stow, Norton, Fairlawn, Sullivan, Seville, Lagrange and Penfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
